phrases.phrase: Select a varname for your user setting.
Add information regarding the user setting.
Provide your user name or email.
You need to be logged in to do that.
Registrati e inizia ad usare {site}, basta un clik!

Can add/edit settings for user groups?
Note: Enable this feature only if creating a plug-in or modifying the package.
Can control privacy settings on their own profile?
Can override a users privacy setting?

<title>Multi-step Registration Form</title><info>Enabling this option will turn the registration process into multiple steps and using as few fields as we can on the first step to entice users to register.</info>
Users are required to upload a profile image?
<title>Registration Steps</title><info>With this option you can add extra steps to the registration process.</info>

<title>Usernames to suggest</title><info>When users fail the username verification at signup several usernames will be suggested. The values here are the first part of those suggestions, (the second part is a random number).
Possible outcomes: user234 member181 friend921</info>

<title>How many usernames to suggest</title><info>When users verify their username at signup they are presented with a list of valid usernames they can choose from, how many usernames to show in that list?</info>

Select name_photo if you would like to by default display the users name and photo only within the browse section. Select name_photo_detail if you would like to display the users name, photo and general details about the person within the browse section.
Can edit a users account? Notice: Requires the ability to log into the AdminCP.
Can stay logged into the site?
Can change profile photos added by other users?
Can edit privacy settings for other users?
How many times can this user group edit their user name?

Define what age should a users profile be forced to be private regardless of their profile privacy setting. If the users age is the the same or lower then the setting only their friends will be able to see their profile and interact with them. Notice: Set to "0" (without quotes) for no limit.
Can this user group be blocked by other users?
Set to True if you would like to validate a users full name.
Can members of this user group feature and unfeature members?

<title>Random featured members</title><info>Should featured members randomly show up?
When this feature is disabled a new section will be shown in the Browse members in the Admin Panel (browsing for featured members) to set the ordering.</info>
<title>How Many Featured Members To Show</title><info>This setting tells how many featured members will be shown at one time.</info>

<title>Verify Email At Signup</title><info>When a guest signs up, should they verify their email address?
If enabled an email will be sent with a special link to verify that is their address.</info>

<title>Verify Email Timeout</title><info>This setting tells how much time (in minutes) new members have in order to verify their email address.
Make sure your email server is well configured as this setting relies on the user being able to click the link sent when they signed up.
If your site allows changing email address and you require the new one to be verified as well this setting also applies in this case.
Set it to 0 to disable the timeout.</info>
Should members of this user group be allowed to change their email address?

<title>Logout After Changing Email</title><info>If users must verify their email address, when they change their email address should they be logged out so they need to verify right away?
If you set this to no they will be able to use the site until they sign out, after that they will need to verify their email address.</info>
Allow members of this user group to verify other's email address from the AdminCP -> Users -> Browse Users ?
Can members of this user group delete their own account?
Can members of this user group change their full name?

How many times can members of this user group change their full name?
Leave to 0 for unlimited
Can members of this user group delete other people's account?
Select True to display a users online status, which will alter the users profile image to distinguish from other members that are offline.
The total amount of space a user can use when uploading to the server (eg. photos, videos, songs etc...) in megabytes (mb). Set to "0" for unlimited space.
Force users to use the cropping tool before completing the profile photo upload routine. Note: This is used to make sure all photos on the site are correctly cropped.
Max file size for profile photos uploaded in kilobits (kb). (1000 kb = 1 mb) For an unlimited size limit add "0" without quotes.
<title>Minimum Length for Username</title><info>Minimum Length for Username</info>
<title>Maximum Length for Username</title><info>Maximum Length for Username</info>
Your password has been sent to your email.
We found a problem with your request, please try again.
You cannot rate your own profile.

You still need to verify your email address.
Privacy settings have been disabled for your user group.
Il tuo nome completo di cognome.
Account settings updated. Your new mail address requires verification and an email has been sent. Until then your email remains the same.
Email updated. You need to verify your new email address before logging in.
Your email has been verified, please log in with the information you provided during sign up.
You have already blocked this user.
You need to add a message to show.
Select if the cancellation option is active or not.
You are not allowed to delete your own account.
Provide a name for the user group.
You registered an account on {site_title}, before being able to use your account you need to verify that this is your email address by clicking here: {link}
Email does not match the one that is currently in use.
You need to verify your email address before logging in. We sent a verification code to: {email}
You do not have permission to modify this item.
{full_name} ha cambiato la foto del suo profilo.
You have requested for us to send you a new password for {site_title}. To confirm this request, follow the link below: {link}
Password request ID does not match.
You have requested for us to send you a new password for {site_title}. Your new password is: {password} To login, follow the link below: {link}
You registered an account on {site_title}, before being able to use your account you need to verify that this is your email address by clicking here: {link}
This display name is not allowed to be used.
Select a user group for this user.
Seleziona la tua data di nascita.
Username is required and can only contain alphanumeric characters and _ or - and must be between 5 and 25 characters long.
Your current password does not match your old password.
Check our agreement in order to join our site.
Not a valid user name. User name can only contain alphanumeric characters and _ or - and must be between {min} and {max} characters long.
Unable to upload. You have reached your limit of {current}. You are currently using {total}.
Unable to upload. You have reached your limit of {limit}. With this upload you will be using {total}.
Unable to find the user you plan to edit.
Email is invalid and cannot be used.
This email is not allowed to be used.
Are you completely sure you want to delete this user?
Puoi caricare una foto in formato JPG, GIF o PNG.
Il nome utente serve per collegare facilmente il tuo profilo al tuo nome reale, ad esempio www.nomedeltuosito.it/tuo_nome (ricorda che NON puoi usare spazi o virgole)
Click here to learn more about our memberships.
No, do not unblock this user.
Are you sure you want to block {user_info}?
No, do not block this user.
Cerca persone per indirizzo email, nome completo o nome utente.
Questo nome utente non è più disponibile, potresti scegliere tra i suggerimenti riportati di fianco.
save or cancel
Are you sure you want to delete the user group "{title}"?
Yes, I am sure. Move any members that belong to the user group "{title}" to
No thanks, get me out of here.
Check the box to confirm that you want to edit this field.
View all the activity from this IP.
Unable to find any members with the current browse criteria.
The image you uploaded is rather small so we are unable to crop it, however you can still save this image if you want to use it.

Clicca e disegna un riquadro nella foto originale per creare la tua foto profilo ritagliata, che può essere vista sotto "Anteprima". Una volta che hai fatto clicca su "Salva Avatar". Gli Avatar sono molto usati all'interno del sito (forum, eventi ecc.).
Il limite massimo di peso di una immagine è {file_size}. Se il caricamento non funziona, prova a caricare un'immagine più piccola.
La Modalità Invisibile ti consente di navigare su nomedeltuosito senza apparire nella lista degli utenti collegati.
Display age and date of birth.
Display age and day/month of birth.
Hide my age and date of birth.
Check the boxes to unblock users.
No custom fields have been added.
I have read and agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Why are you deleting your account?
Are you absolutely sure? This operation cannot be undone.
{total_user_change} su {total} cambi di nome utente consentiti.
Changing your email address requires you to verify your new email.

The link that brought you here is not valid, it may already have expired. Email verify links expire {time} after being sent.

A new verification link has been sent to your email address, please verify your address on time

This site is very concerned about security and therefore it requires you to verify your email address.

An email has been sent to you, it contains a special link which verifies you and allows you to log in freely. This verification is required only once for this email address.

Please check your email and verify your email address now.
<title>On Signup New Friend</title><info>If you select a user from the drop down this user will automatically become friends with any new member that registers.</info>
Provide a name that is not representing an empty name.
You have already added this recently. Try adding something else.

<title>Spam Check Status Updates</title><info>Define how many status updates should we check to see if the new status update the user is adding is similar and if one is we will guide them to add another status update.</info>
Your confirmed password does not match your new password.
Complete this step to setup your personal profile.
You are required to upload a profile image.
<title>Redirect After SignUp</title><info>Add the full path you want to send users right after they register. If you want to use our default routine just leave this blank.</info>

<title>Suggest Usernames At Registration</title><info>When enabled the guest will be shown a list of valid usernames if the one they attempted is not available.
This setting enables or disables "Usernames to suggest"</info>
Can search a users gender using the browse filter?
Can search for users based on their age using the browse filter?
Can browse users using the public browse section?
A {full_name} piace che tu sia entrato/a a far parte di nomedeltuosito!
A {full_name} piace che {view_full_name} si sia unito alla community.
A {full_name} piace che tu ti sia unito/a a nomedeltuosito!
A {full_name} piace il tuo stato.
A {full_name} piace il suo stato.
A {full_name} piace lo stato di {view_full_name}.
A {full_name} piace la tua foto profilo.
A {full_name} piace la foto profilo di {view_full_name}.
A {full_name} piace il suo stesso commento.

Select full_name to order members based on their full name in ascending order. Select last_login to order members based on their last activity, where the latest person to be active on the site is first.
Can modify a users "user group" status?
<title>User Age Privacy on Browse Section</title><info>Enable this option to remove users that have hidden their age from the browse section.</info>

<title>User Default Privacy Setting on Registration</title><info>With this setting you can control the default privacy setting for a user when they register. This will control how others view their profile.
anyone = Anyone can view their profile.
network = Only members of the site can view their profile.
friends_only = Only their friends can view their profile.
no_one = Nobody can view their profile.</info>
<title>Minimum Ratings for "Top Rated" Users</title><info>Define how many times a member must be rated on before they are listed on the "Top Rated" section.</info>
Can view a users "Last Login" time stamp on their profile even if the user is logged as invisible?
<title>Approve Users</title><info>Enable this if you want to approve users before they can log into the site.</info>
Your account has been approved on {site_title}. {link}
Allow users to edit their default site currency?
Mostra i prezzi e compra in questa valuta.
<title>Display or Full Name</title><info>When a user registers on the site they can either enter their full name or display name. This setting controls what they should be entering.</info>

<title>Disable Username on Registration</title><info>If this is enabled it will disable the "Username" field on the registration form. The Username is used to create a vanity URL of users (eg. http://www.site.com/username). If this is disabled we will use their unique ID number to create their vanity URL. You can then enable a user group setting that can allow users to edit their username at a later time.</info>
<title>Check For Promotions</title><info>If you enable this option it will enable the promotion system and will run a check on users when they are logged into the site.</info>
Congratulations! You have been promoted to the following user group: {title}
Before you can use this feature you need to enable the option "Check For Promotions", which can be found here.
{full_name} ha commentato la tua attività feeds.
<title>Allow User Registration</title><info>Enable this setting to allow public registration.</info>
You are unable to delete a site administrator.
You are unable to ban a site administrator.
You are unable to edit a site administrators account.

<title>User AJAX Tooltip</title><info>Enable this setting to load an AJAX popup when hovering over certain member names that include the users profile image as well as some information about them.</info>

Ciao {user_name},
ultimamente non sei stato molto attivo, perchè non vieni a leggere quello che ti abbiamo scritto su {site_name}

Perchè non vieni a trovare i tuoi amici? Ci sono un sacco di cose da fare insieme!
There are a total of {iCount} inactive members
Enter a number to size each batch
Can members of this user group log in as another user without entering a password?

You are about to log in as the user {user_name} ({full_name}). This has the same effect as if you logged in with that user's password. When in this mode, all your actions will be regarded as executed by {full_name}.
To go back to your admin user you will need to log out and back in.
Abort log in as this user
Your registration to {site_name} has been denied
At this moment your profile does not meet the minimum requirements for our site. If you feel this is an error, feel free to contact us to {site_email}
You are about to deny user {user_name} from the site. If you want to send an email to this user you may do it here

<title>Brute Force Prevention: Attempts Count</title><info>How many attempts are allowed within the time limit?
This setting is used together with "Brute Force Prevention: Time limit" to better protect your site from brute force login attempts.
You define a time in minutes and how many failed attempts are allowed within that period of time, if a user fails to log in within that period of time, missing this many tries the account is locked for a certain time, this lock time is defined by the cool down time and during this time even if the correct log in is entered, access will be denied.</info>

<title>Brute Force Prevention: Time Limit</title><info>How many minutes back should the script check? Set this to 0 if you do not want to run this check
This setting is used together with "Brute Force Prevention: Attempts Count" to better protect your site from brute force login attempts.</info>
<title>Brute Force Prevention: Cool Down</title><info>When an account has been locked due to a brute force check, how many minutes should the user wait before unlocking the account?</info>

Brute force attempt logged. Your account has been locked for {iCoolDown} minutes. If you forgot your password please use the Forgot Password tool. You can try to log in again in {iUnlockTimeOut} minutes.
There is already an account assigned with the email "{email}". If this is your email please login here.
<title>Force Users to Upload Profile Image</title><info>Enable this option to force users to upload a profile image before they can register.</info>
<title>Hide Main Menu</title><info>Enable this option to hide the main menu if a user is not logged into the site.</info>
<title>Invite Only</title><info>Enable this option if your community is an "invite only" community.</info>
<title>Terms & Privacy Confirmation</title><info>Enable this option if users must confirm that they understand and have ready over your sites terms and privacy policies.</info>
<title>Enable Relationships</title><info>If you would like your users to have the ability to set their relationship statues on your community enable this feature.</info>
Definisci come gli altri utenti interagiscano con il tuo profilo.
Mostra la mia data di nascita completa sul mio profilo.
Show only month & day in my profile.
Don't show my birthday in my profile.

Customize your default settings for when sharing new items on the site. Note this only changes your default settings for future items and does not change any items you have already shared. To change the privacy settings on those items you can customize the items privacy by editing the item itself.
Visualizzare chi riceve aggiornamenti da te
Vedere chi ha visitato recentemente il tuo profilo
Chi può condividere sulla tua bacheca
Vedere le foto del tuo profilo
Vedere le informazioni del tuo profilo
A {full_name} piace il tuo stato "{content}" To view this status update follow the link below: {link}
A {full_name} piace il commento che hai scritto sulla bacheca di {row_full_name}
A {full_name} piace il commento "{content}" che hai scritto sulla bacheca di {row_full_name}. To view this comment follow the link below: {link}
A {full_name} il commento "{content}" che hai scritto. Per leggere il commento segui il link qui sotto: {link}
{$sSiteTitle} is an invite only community. Enter your email below if you have received an invitation.
{sSiteName} è ti aiuta a rimenere in contatto con amici, colleghi, parenti. Provalo!
{sSiteTitle} è ti aiuta a rimenere in contatto con amici, colleghi, parenti. Provalo!
